meanings.definition: A person engaged in trade or commerce, typically skilled in a particular craft or occupation.
meanings.sent1: The tradesmen worked together to build the new house in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The tradesmen at the market were selling their handmade goods.
meanings.sent3: The tradesmen decided to have a friendly competition to see who could craft the best item.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, tradesmen are the artists creating with their hands and minds.
meanings.sent5: The tradesmen's workshop buzzed with the sound of tools and creativity.
